system.damageOrEffect:
When a Psyker suffers damage from weapon must make -10 Willpower Test or be Stunned for DoF Rounds. 
If target has Warp Instability Trait suffers damage from weapon must make -10 Instability Test.

description.value: Damage/Effect: When a Psyker suffers damage from weapon must make -10 Willpower Test or be Stunned for DoF Rounds. If target has Warp Instability Trait suffers damage from weapon must make -10 Instability Test.
